description: Nonnegative numbers of form n^3 (+/-) 3, n >= 0.
comments: It is conjectured that A003325 and A052276 (the current sequence) have infinitely many numbers in common, although only one example (128) is known.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,3,-3,-3,3,1,-1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 05 2000
